fields.name: Apple MacBook Air (2020) MVH52N/A Gold
fields.description: Thanks to the renewed Magic Keyboard of the Apple MacBook Air (2020) MVH52N/A Gold, you can work comfortably. The scissor mechanism in this keyboard is more stable, which makes it more pleasant to type long texts. You can do this no matter where you are. That's because the True tone screen automatically adjusts itself to the ambient light. On top of that, you can easily transport the Apple MacBook Air in your bag. Because the laptop has a 13-inch screen and weighs only 1.25kg, you'll barely notice that the laptop is in your bag. Forgot your charger? No problem. A full battery lasts up to 12 hours.

fields.name: Lenovo IdeaPad L340-17IRH 81LL003BMH
fields.description: The Lenovo IdeaPad L340-17IRH 81LL003BMH is a 17.3-inch gaming laptop with NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 video card. With it, you can play current games at ultra settings. This Lenovo Gaming laptop contains an Intel Core i7-9750H processor. That's a more powerful processor than the 'regular' i7 process most laptops have. That means this gaming laptop provides more power than a laptop with a 'regular' Intel Core i7 processor. You can store a large part of your games collection on the 1TB HDD, and you use the 256GB SSD for the games you play the most. This laptop's webcam has a physical closure, so your privacy's guaranteed after your conversation's over.

fields.name: Apple Magic Keyboard QWERTY
fields.description: Take care of your daily tasks faster and more accurately with the Apple Magic Keyboard. The new scissor mechanism gives you a more comfortable keyboard with fewer typos. The Magic keyboard connects to your Mac or PC wirelessly via Bluetooth. There's no need to worry about battery life. One full battery charge gives you a month of keyboard usage without you needing to recharge it.

fields.name: Philips 243V7QDAB
fields.description: The Philips 243V7QDAB is a 23.8-inch monitor suitable for daily tasks such as reading emails or surfing the web. Texts are displayed clearly with the Full HD resolution, and remain legible from all angles thanks to the IPS panel. With the blue light filter, you can keep scrolling through your Facebook feed far into the early hours of the morning without straining your eyes. Do you enjoy listening to music on Spotify? This Philips monitor has integrated speakers, so it's ready to play your tunes.

fields.name: Trust Yvi Wireless Mouse Black
fields.description: The Trust Yvi Wireless Mouse Black is compact, wireless, and suitable for both left and right-handed use. The mouse is plug and play, so you can use it on any desktop or laptop without having to install it first. The connection to your laptop is made via the included USB nano receiver. The receiver can stay plugged into your laptop when you're on the road, or you can store it in the mouse.

fields.name: Sony WH-1000XM3 Silver
fields.description: The Sony WH-1000XM3 wireless headphones let you enjoy 38 hours of clear and high-resolution audio. Use Bluetooth to connect the design to your smartphone or tablet. This way, you can listen to your favorite music wirelessly. If you turn on the adjustable noise canceling, you won't be disturbed by outside noise. This way, you can travel in peace or eliminate any disturbing ambient noise at the office. Turn on Smart Listening via the app. After detecting your activity, this function adjust the strength of the noise canceling. The frequency range from 4 to 40,000Hz allows you to enjoy Hi-Res audio. This means not a single detail will escape your ears, and you'll hear all nuances of the bass and treble. Noise canceling: The Sony WH-1000XM3 has noise canceling. This technology analyzes the environment via microphones and transforms it into an anti-noise. This anti-noise ensures that you hear the original sound less well. This way, ambient noise is muted while you listen to music. These headphones not only dampen sounds like vehicles, but also voices. This way, you only hear the music and nothing else on the road and in the office. Wireless high quality : The Sony WH-1000XM3 has the Bluetooth profiles aptX and LDAC. These 2 profiles both ensure that the wireless Bluetooth signal loses as little quality as possible. This means you don't need a cable to enjoy high quality music. You can wirelessly play hi-res audio files and hear a lot of detail in your favorite songs. Sound according to the expert: The factory settings of these headphones ensure that you enjoy a strong bass. Thanks to an accent around 125 Hertz, the bass is very clearly audible. The medium-high tones are balanced, which means that they're no longer or less audible. As a result, the medium-high tones don't deviate from how the artist intended. You can use the equalizer when you like a different sound. This way, you adjust the sound to your own taste.

fields.name: Acer Swift 3 SF314-58-59KV
fields.description: You can use the Acer Swift 3 SF314-58-59KV for your graphic studies and visual tasks. That's because this 14-inch model has an Intel Core i5 processor that smoothly runs programs like Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Thanks to 8GB RAM, you can switch between open programs without the laptop lagging. And thanks to the Full HD resolution, you can watch a series in 1080p resolution. The Swift also has a fingerprint scanner which lets you log in faster than when you need to type a password. As a result, you can start taking notes during a lecture right away. You can open the Swift and boot the laptop in a few seconds thanks to the SSD. Want to quickly finish your report when it's dark? The backlit keyboard helps you prevent typos.

fields.name: Apple iPad (2019) 128GB WiFi Space Gray
fields.description: You can use the Apple iPad (2019) 128GB WiFi Space Gray to check your social media, watch videos, or work on school projects. The 10.2-inch Retina Display is larger than that of its predecessor, the Apple iPad (2018). This means you have more screen space available to check out the latest Apple TV+ additions. You can also easily open multiple apps at the same time. This way, you can listen music and send some messages while working on a project. Thanks to the powerful A10 Fusion processor, the Apple iPad (2019) will always run smoothly. Thanks to iPadOS, the special iPad operating system, all apps run optimally in split-screen mode. With the smart connector, you can connect your Smart Keyboard to your iPad so you can be just as productive as with a laptop. You can also connect your Apple Pencil 1 to take notes or draw something.

fields.name: Apple iPad Pro (2020) 12.9 inches 256GB WiFi Space Gray
fields.description: With the Apple iPad Pro (2020) 12.9 inches 256GB WiFi Space Gray, you can work on your creative projects. You can use the 2 cameras on the back to capture your images yourself. Thanks to the ultra wide-angle lens, you can capture a larger image in one video or photo. After that, you'll have everything you need to design your project, since the iPad Pro has an A12Z processor. This allows you to multitask without problems and use different apps side by side. You can work on your projects in detail on the large 12.9-inch Retina screen. The iPad Pro is optimized for Augmented Reality thanks to the LiDAR Scanner. This sensor accurately measures the distances so that you'll get the most out of your AR games and apps.
fields.image: Apple iPad Pro (2020) 12.9 inches 256gb wifi space.jpg

fields.name: Reflections Set of 4 Microfiber Napkins
fields.description: Complete the look of your table setting with these easy-care microfiber napkins.  great for everyday use or entertaining liquid-resistant design helps protect against spills set of 4 Polyester.Each measures 19x19". Washable. Imported.

fields.name: Samsung LS24R650
fields.description: The Samsung LS24R650 is a 24-inch monitor for business use. This monitor has a sleek and virtually bezel-less design, so it doesn't look out of place in an office or home office. It's suitable for everyday use as well, such as watching a YouTube video. Because this monitor a IPS screen, you'll experience true-to-life colors from every angle. This way, you can easily show a presentation to a colleague sitting next to you. The blue light filter and the flicker-free technology reduce strained and irritated eyes. The LS24R650 isn't just adjustable in height, but you can also tilt and rotate the screen. As a result, you can create an ideal working posture. You can mount this monitor to the wall with a VESA wall mount.

fields.name: Apple Magic Mouse 2
fields.description: The Apple Magic Mouse 2 lets you easily swipe through webpages, scroll through texts, and navigate your files. Thanks to the soft, multi-touch surface, you can operate this mouse just like a smartphone. Those who prefer more traditional controls can also opt for one or two-button control. The laser tracking mechanism combines optical technology with the precision of a laser. As a result, the Apple Magic Mouse 2 works on any surface. Thanks to the wireless Bluetooth connection, tangled cables are a thing of the past. Add the rechargeable battery and you've got a mouse you can enjoy for many years to come. This is an original Apple accessory.Note: this mouse only comes with a USB-A cable. If you want to connect your Magic Mouse wired to a MacBook (from 2015) or MacBook Pro (from 2016), you'll need an additional USB-C converter

fields.name: Beats Studio3
fields.description: With the Beats Studio3 Wireless headphones, cables are a thing of the past. The noise canceling headphones connect to your smartphone, tablet, or laptop using Bluetooth. You can activate the active noise suppression with a push of the button and optimally enjoy your music in the train or plane. Thanks to Apple's W1 chip, you can quickly connect to several Apple devices. When you're in the train, the headphones automatically connect to your iPhone. Arrived at the office? Your headphones will automatically connect to the iMac you're working on. Thanks to the Fast Fuel technology, you can charge your headphones in 15 minutes for 3 hours of listening fun. Noise canceling: With the Beats Studio3, you hear less of your surroundings thanks to noise canceling. This technology measures the ambient noise via the built-in microphones and turns this into an anti-noise. This anti-noise ensures that you hear less of the environment. This means you can immerse yourself in your favorite music in the office and on the go. W1 chip: The Beats Studio3 headphones have the W1 chip by Apple. This chip ensures that you can quickly connect the headphones to all your iCloud devices. Simply hold the headphones a few centimeters from your iPhone and your device will recognize the headphones. In addition, the chip saves battery and ensures better sound quality.FastFuel: The battery of the Beats Studio3 lasts 40 hours with the noise canceling switched off. If the noise canceling is enabled, the battery lasts for 22 hours. When the battery of the headphones is empty, FastFuel ensures that you can listen to music again in no time. After 10 minutes of charging, you can use the headphones again for 3 hours.Sound according to the expert.The factory default sound of the Beats Studio3 Wireless emphasizes the bass, making the bass sound clearly audible. Instruments and vocals can prevail. This is because the medium-high frequency range is emphasized. Note: these headphones don't have an equalizer that allows you to adjust the sound manually. You're dependent on the sound of the factory settings.

fields.name: Razer Ornata Chroma QWERTY
fields.description: The Razer Ornata Chroma is a colorful gaming keyboard developed for gamers looking for the sensitivity of mechanical keys without the noise. The Ornata Chroma is equipped with semi-mechanical keys: the mechanical switch is fixed to a membrane. This provides you with keys that are more responsive than those on a membrane keyboard, without having to pay a fortune. The keys are half as low as the standard size, which means they require less pressure and allow you to respond faster. Adjust the keyboard lighting to your taste. You can select one of the breathing patterns or illuminate particular keys for particular games: the Razer Synapse 2.0 software provides you with 16.8 million colors to choose from. It comes with an ergonomic wrist rest to prevent RSI, so you can play comfortably for hours on end.

fields.name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch Touch Bar (2019) MVVJ2N/A Space Gray
fields.description: Work on your graphic design projects in detail using the large screen of the Apple MacBook Pro 16 inches. Thanks to the thinner screen bezels and higher resolution, you'll have more workspace. Despite the larger screen, you can easily bring the MacBook Pro 16-inch to your next assignment, since the MacBook itself hasn't become bigger. With the fast 6-core Intel Core i7 processor, you can effortlessly run the most demanding programs like Final Cut Pro. This powerhouse's 16GB of RAM makes multitasking child's play. With the AMD Radeon Pro 5300M video card, all your video projects will be rendered in no time. The renewed Magic Keyboard of the MacBook Pro is less susceptible to malfunctions and feels more stable. This allows you to type more comfortably and silently. On top of that, the slightly smaller Touch Bar now also offers space for a physical escape key and a separate Touch ID sensor. Note: Do you want to use a monitor with this MacBook? Choose a 4K monitor with 10-bit color depth and a USB-C or Thunderbolt 3 connector.
fields.image: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch Touch Bar (2019) MVVJ2NA Space Gray.jpg

fields.name: Levi's 529 Curvy Bootcut Jeans
fields.description: Levis 529 curvy bootcut jeans are flattering and perfect for any timeday or night.  sits below the waist slim fit through hip and thigh bootcut leg with 18" opening smooth bottom 8" front rise; 15" back rise cotton/polyester/elastane washable imported misses average: 32" inseam

fields.name: Lenovo Tab M10 4GB 64GB WiFi Black
fields.description: With the Lenovo M10 4GB 64GB, you can keep track of emails and social media and watch your favorite movies and series. You won't miss a single detail thanks to the spacious 10.1-inch Full HD screen. The screen has an integrated blue light filter that's easier on the eyes. Thanks to the 2 Dolby Atmos stereo speakers, sound is also clearly audible. The tablet has 4GB RAM and a 1.8GH Octa-Core processor. This makes it suitable for games, but not at the highest quality. You can store your apps and files on the 64GB storage, which you can expand to 256GB with a memory card if necessary.

fields.name: HP ENVY x360 Convertible 15-ds0500nd
fields.description: The HP ENVY x360 Convertible 15-ds0500nd is a laptop that you can also use as a tablet thanks to the foldable touchscreen. This way, you can, for example, edit photos with your fingers. The Ryzen 5 processor is fast enough. Photoshop starts in seconds thanks to the 512GB SSD. With the fingerprint scanner, you can log in quickly and securely by placing your index finger on the sensor. Do you prefer not to work on the touchscreen, but on the keyboard? Since the keyboard is backlit, you can also continue working when all the lights go out at the office. After a long day at work, you can splash on your couch at home and enjoy the purest sound during a Netflix series with the Bang & Olufsen speakers.

fields.name: Trust Nado wireless Bluetooth keyboard
fields.description: With the Trust Nado Wireless Bluetooth Keyboard you won't bother anyone with typing sounds. Not even if you get up to 350 strokes per minute. This is thanks to the quiet, flat keys. Thanks to Bluetooth 3.0 you can easily connect the keyboard to a PC, tablet, or smartphone. This is the solution if you want to take notes during a lecture, but you don't want to carry around a laptop. The keyboard has 13 multimedia shortcuts for iPhone and iPad, with which you can adjust the sound of your music,for example. 8 of those keys can also be used for devices that run Windows.

fields.name: HP EliteDisplay E243
fields.description: The HP EliteDisplay E243 is a 24-inch monitor that's adjustable in different ways, so you can adjust it completely to fit your posture in order to create an ergonomic working place at home or in the office. Use the EliteDisplay E243 at the office for simple tasks such as word processing, surfing on the internet, and spreadsheets. The IPS panel displays a wider viewing angle and realistic color representation on a sharp Full HD screen. That way, your colleagues can easily look over your shoulder to check out the presentation you put together. You can also place a second screen next to the EliteDisplay, since the thin bezels make the screen suitable for a multi-monitor setup. Note: this product includes an HDMI cable by default.

fields.name: Trust GXT 105
fields.description: If you're looking for a mouse that is loaded with lighting options, the Trust GXT 105 is the right mouse for you. The entire surface of the mouse lights up in red, blue, green, or white. The mouse has 2 thumb buttons, allowing you to easily navigate the programs and control 2 extra actions while gaming. The braided, 1.8-meter cable won't suffer from wear and tear or break as quickly.

fields.name: KEF Q350 Black (per pair)
fields.description: With the KEF Q350 you can listen to a pure and wide sound image. This passive speaker is equipped with the Uni-Q system. This means that the 25 mm tweeter is placed in the middle of the 165 mm woofer. The result is a detailed sound that is widely distributed throughout the room. The woofer produces powerful mid and low tones. This driver is combined with a bass reflex port, making the bass tones extra deep. You use 2 speakers as a stereo pair or as part of a surround setup. Thanks to the compact design, you can easily place them in your room.

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 256GB WiFi Gray
fields.description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 is a powerful tablet that you can use for entertainment purposes as well as for work or school. You can watch your favorite Netflix series on the virtually bezel-less 2560x1600 10.5-inch screen. You can almost imagine yourself being part of the series thanks to the powerful sound of the 4 AKG stereo speakers. In the meantime, you can quickly switch to the latest news thanks to the 8GB RAM. Thanks to the powerful 2.4 GHz Octa-Core processor, the tablet can also effortlessly perform demanding tasks such as running games or photo and video editing. The included Samsung S pen allows you to do so with the utmost precision. You can easily store the pen in the magnetic holder on the back of the tablet.

fields.name: Acer Chromebook Spin 311 CP311-2H-C3DE
fields.description: The Acer Chromebook Spin 311 CP311-2H-C3DE is easy to carry thanks to its 11.6-inch size. This 2-in-1 laptop and tablet combination is suitable for tasks like text processing, browsing the Internet, and emailing while you're on the train. This device runs on Chrome OS, which means you can log in with your Google account and edit files via Google Drive. If you fold the 360-degree tiltable screen, you can use the Chromebook in multiple positions. You can use the Chromebook as a tablet and swipe through your apps on the multi-touch screen. The tent position can be used for showing a presentation to your colleagues or customers. When typing the annual report on the keyboard, you can put the device in the laptop position. The Chromebook is energy-efficient, so you can use it the entire day without having to search for a socket. Note: You can't run Windows programs on a Chromebook. Do you want to use Microsoft Office? If so, buy Office 365.

fields.name: Apple iPad (2019) 32GB WiFi Silver
fields.description: TYou can use the Apple iPad (2019) 32GB WiFi Silver to check your social media, watch videos, or work on school projects. The 10.2-inch Retina Display is larger than that of its predecessor, the Apple iPad (2018). This means you have more screen space available to check out the latest Apple TV+ additions. You can also easily open multiple apps at the same time. This way, you can listen music and send some messages while working on a project. Thanks to the powerful A10 Fusion processor, the Apple iPad (2019) will always run smoothly. Thanks to iPadOS, the special iPad operating system, all apps run optimally in split-screen mode. With the smart connector, you can connect your Smart Keyboard to your iPad so you can be just as productive as with a laptop. You can also connect your Apple Pencil 1 to take notes or draw something. Note: an Apple Pencil isn't included.

fields.name: Logitech G815 Lightsync RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard GL Tactile QWERTY
fields.description: With the Logitech G815 Lightsync RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard GL Tactile you assure yourself of a place in the top 3 of every game. Professional gamers cannot do without a keyboard with mechanical keys and for a reason. The Logitech G815 has mechanical keys, which means that the keystrokes are registered with the highest precision every time. A mechanical keyboard does that faster than a keyboard without mechanical switches. You also get a nice feedback from the keyboard so that you hear and feel that you have pressed the key. In addition, with the G815 you have programmable keys, to which you link macros. Synchronize the RGB lighting of the keyboard with your games to give your setup a professional look.
fields.image: Logitech G815 Lightsync RGB Mechanical Gaming Keyboard GL Tactile QWERTY.jpg

fields.name: Apple MacBook Air (2020) MVH42N/A Silver
fields.description: Thanks to the renewed Magic Keyboard of the Apple MacBook Air (2020) MVH42N/A Silver, you can work comfortably. The scissor mechanism in this keyboard is more stable, which makes it more pleasant to type long texts. You can do this no matter where you are. That's because the True tone screen automatically adjusts itself to the ambient light. On top of that, you can easily transport the Apple MacBook Air in your bag. Because the laptop has a 13-inch screen and weighs only 1.25kg, you'll barely notice that the laptop is in your bag. Forgot your charger? No problem. A full battery lasts up to 12 hours.

fields.name: SteelSeries Apex Pro TKL Gaming Keyboard
fields.description: With the SteelSeries Apex Pro TKL Gaming Keyboard you get the fastest keyboard of the moment. The sensitivity and registration time of the new OmniPoint switches can be adjusted per key. So you always set the right sensitivity and travel per test for the right moments. For gaming, use a low registration time and low travel so that you always respond first, or set the registration time and travel a bit higher so that you can type comfortably without making spelling mistakes when composing an e-mail. The Apex Pro is a keyboard for every occasion due to its adaptability. Add to that the RGB lighting and the magnetic palm rest and that makes the Apex Pro the ultimate gaming keyboard of the moment.
fields.image: SteelSeries Apex Pro TKL Gaming Keyboard QWERTY.jpg

fields.name: Samsung LC34H890WJUXEN
fields.description: The Samsung LC34H890WJUXEN is a 34-inch curved monitor for your office or home if you want extra screen space. Thanks to the Ultra WQHD 3440x1440 resolution, you can use the monitor for displaying or editing high resolution visual material or large amounts of data. The monitor has a curved screen, so it follows the curve of your eyes. You'll be able to notice details more easily and images like pictures and 3D renders of surroundings will appear more true to life. On top of that, you'll have more screen space to work with, thanks to the ultra-wide size. Send through your image and supply your laptop with power, thanks to the USB-C port. You can also connect your smartphone with USB-C to charge it. The Samsung software for Windows helps you to divide programs and screens automatically across your image so you can multitask efficiently. Connect 2 video sources and display both images on the same screen, thanks to the Picture-by-Picture mode.

fields.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 (2019) WiFi 32GB Black + Just in Case Keyboard Book Case
fields.description: You can protect your new Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 (2019) against scratches and dents with the Just in Case Bluetooth Keyboard Book Case. In addition, you can easily tap reports and emails on your tablet with the integrated keyboard. You can also use the cover as a stand for typing or when you watch a series on the 10.1-inch Full HD screen of the Tab A 10.1. The sound that comes from the tablet is very vivid, thanks to the double stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos 3D sound. As a result, it's like you're in the middle of your favorite show. Do you download a lot of series? You can expand the 32GB memory with an SD card of up to 512GB.
fields.image: Samsung Galaxy Tab A 10.1 (2019) WiFi 32GB Black + Just in Case Keyboard Book Case.jpg

fields.name: Razer Naga Trinity
fields.description: Thanks to the Razer naga Trinity with 3 interchangeable side panels, you'll never have to change your mouse again. The Naga Trinity combines the best of 3 worlds: the DeathAdder, Naga Hex, and Razer Naga. You can play Shooters with the DeathAdder panel, where you have 2 thumb buttons. This is useful if you want to switch your AK47 to automatic in PUBG and still have your push-to-talk buttonon hand. Did you switch to League of Legends? The Hex panel will supply you with the right number of buttons in an easily accessible configuration. Is it time for a raid in your favorite MMO? The Naga panel will give you access to 15 extra buttons for all your skills and macros.

fields.name: Sonos One Duo Pack Black
fields.description: With the Sonos One Duo Pack, you have the basis for a multi-room setup. Connect the 2 speakers to your WiFi network and place them in different rooms. Listen to the same music in multiple rooms or select which song is playing in each room. Control the music and the speakers via the Sonos app on your smartphone or tablet. Stream music from streaming services such as Spotify and Deezer, or choose your own playlists. Smartphone not around? With the touch control on the speaker, you can control the music without using your smartphone or tablet.

fields.name: Apple iPad (2019) 128GB WiFi Space Gray + Otterbox Defender Full Body Case
fields.description: Protect your Apple iPad (2019) from damage with the Otterbox Defender Full Body Case. You can watch videos, check your social media, and work on projects for school or work on the 10.2-inch Retina Display. The Apple iPad (2019) has a fast A10 Fusion chip, which allows you to run multiple apps at the same time. This way, you can work on a project, while sending messages to your friends and colleagues. You can also use it at a construction site, thanks to the rock solid protection of the Otterbox. The Full Body Case has three individual layers that protect your Apple iPad (2019) in the roughest circumstances. Note: the Apple Pencil isn't included.
fields.image: Apple iPad (2019) 128GB WiFi Space Gray + Otterbox Defender Full Body Case.jpg

fields.name: Apple MacBook Pro 13 inches Touch Bar (2019) MV992N/A Silver
fields.description: The Apple MacBook Pro 13 Touch Bar (2019) is a compact powerhouse with its 13 inch. Inside, there is an 8th generation Intel core i5 processor with 4 cores, making it difficult to edit graphic files. You use the Touch Bar to work more efficiently in different programs - for example, you can switch brushes faster in Photoshop - the Retina screen has True Tone, which automatically adjusts white balance to the light in your area, making it also visible when working on the balcony With the 4 usb Thunderbolt 3 ports you always have enough space for all your peripherals.
fields.image: Apple MacBook Pro 13 inches Touch Bar (2019) MV992NA Silver.jpg

fields.name: MSI GP65 Leopard 9SD-021NL
fields.description: The MSI GP65 Leopard 9SD-021NL is a laptop that you can use to play games such as Fortnite on ultra settings. Thanks to the NVIDIA GTX 1660Ti video card, you can also get started with VR games. The 144Hz screen smoothly displays fast action, which can come in handy when playing fast shooters. With the i7 processor and 16GB of RAM, you can run programs such as Discord and Skype on the background to provide your gaming buddies with tactical instructions. Thanks to the 256GB SSD, Windows starts quickly, while the 1TB hard drive can store all of your games. The RGB lighting on the keyboard provides cool colors in the dark.

fields.name: Asus ZenBook UX431FA-AM132T
fields.description: The Asus ZenBook UX431FA-AM132T is a 14-inch laptop that allows you to edit photos anywhere. Thanks to the weight of 1.39 kilograms, you can easily transport this laptop in a bag. Work on your reports and presentations in a coffee shop, cafeteria, or on the patio. The fingerprint scanner allows you to log in quickly and securely using your own fingers. Wherever you go, you won't be bothered by reflections from a bright sun or lamp thanks to the anti-glare screen. Accidentally left your laptop behind on the patio? The integrated TPM chip encrypts the files on the laptop so that no one else can access your files. In the dark, you can continue to work on the backlit keyboard.

fields.name: Kurio Tab XL
fields.description: With the Kurio Tab XL, Kurio presents another tablet that's especially designed for kids, but it is much larger than previous Kurio tablets. Kids won't miss a single detail from their favorite video or (child-friendly) game on the 10-inch screen. Thanks to the Kurio Genius program, you can keep an eye on what your kids are doing and how long they're doing it, and you can easily set a time limit. Set up separate profiles for kids and adjust the time limit and the access to apps per profile. On top of that, Kurio Genius automatically filters harmful websites. In addition, a sturdy cover with thick edges is included with the tablet by default, so the Kurio XL can also survive a drop from the couch.

fields.name: Lenovo IdeaPad S340-15IML 81NA006UMH
fields.description: Genuine leather and sparkling CRYSTALLIZED - Swarovski Elements set this watch apart as a high-quality luxury, perfect for women looking for the finer things in life.  Brand: Armitron Dial Color: White Strap: White leather Accents: 10 CRYSTALLIZED - Swarovski Elements Clasp: Buckle Movement: Quartz Case Width: 22mm Case Thickness: 9mm Bracelet Dimensions: 8 long, 23mm wide Model No.: 75/5089WTGPWT Special Features: white dial, white leather strap, 10 CRYSTALLIZED - Swarovski Elements markers, sweeping second hand Jewelry photos are enlarged to show detail.

fields.name: Jabra Elite 75t Titanium Black
fields.description: The Jabra Elite 75t don't have cables that can tangle when listening to music. These fully wireless earbuds are 20% smaller than its predecessor, the 65t. This makes them more comfortable and less likely to fall out of your ears. The battery of the earbuds lasts for 7.5 hours, which is longer than other fully wireless earbuds. Because the earplugs are water-resistant, you can also use them during workouts. You can charge the earbuds by putting them in the charging case. This case gives an extra battery life of 20.5 hours. Different earbud sizes are included. Try them out so you can easily find the right fit. Adjust sound in app: With the Jabra Sound + app, you can adjust the sound to your liking via an equalizer. You do this by choosing a preset equalizer, or adjusting the bass and treble yourself. This way, you can adjust the earbuds to your wishes and listen to a personalized sound reproduction. Comparison: The Jabra Elite 75t are 20% smaller than the Jabra Elite 65t. This makes the earbuds lighter, less protruding, and more secure in your ears. In addition, the battery life has been increased by 2.5 hours, which brings the total battery life to 7.5 hours. This way, you can listen to music all day without charging the earbuds.
